website_summaries.verdict: Suitable for sensitive skin, since this is paraben-free.
pros: Lots of good ingredients like shea butter, coconut oil, argan oil, jojoba, and monoi de Tahiti oil for super smooth skin
Color develops evenly and without any weird smell
cons: Takes a long time to dry
It can rub off on clothes even after a few hours of setting time

customer_reviews.title: Best Sunless Tanner I have used!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite sunless tanner. First, it does NOT have that awful smell that other self tanners have when they work with your skin. Second, easy to apply and doesn't streak (This does take some time getting used to applying. If you have never applied before, you may see some streaks or areas that didn't go on even. Use an exfoliator the next day and reapply and problem solved). Third, the color is natural and looks great. It's not an orange like some get. Give it a shot and you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Oleson

customer_reviews.title: Great smell and golden color!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried many self tanning products and this one has the best scent of them all. Put it on after my evening shower then showered the next morning to wash away the excess bronzer. I did this two days in a row and got a beautiful golden tan. It’s been one week and the color is still holding up well. Great product. Been recommending it to all of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Chris & Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant at first to buy something on line but all the ones from the local stores made my skin look orange. This product I can honestly tell you is great. I am going to Florida but did not want to look white and but did not want to go to a tanning salon and get more wrinkles : ) I am getting so many compliments on my tan and I haven't even left yet. I was unsure if I should tan my face as other products make my dark spots darker but this product did not. Do not hesitate on this one. Try it - you won't be disappointed. I will be ordering another bottle soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tan comes off with water.
customer_reviews.text: This product works until you take a shower and then it all washes off. I can see the color come off in the shower. I have even tried putting it on at night and not showering until the next evening and it still comes off. It is ones day I have a tan and then shower and no more tan. It takes for ever to dry and makes it uncomfortable to sleep at night. I just feel sticky. On to finding something that works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best self tanner I have used. I usually stick with a “mousse” style self tanner but I really like this lotion. It leaves my skin super soft and the scent is pleasant when it goes on but also dissipates right away leaving no smell! Everyone comments how natural the look is and I put it on my face every other day instead of putting on makeup. No streaks, I always use gloves to put on, even a light layer will do-it dries instantly. Honestly just buy this tanner bc it is the best I’ve tried and no chemicals makes it a no brained.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best natural, clean ingredient tanner I have used (and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best natural, clean ingredient tanner I have used (and I’ve tried a ton of them- including my second favorite vita liberata medium lotion). It gives you a nice golden tan within a few hours of applying it. The smell is pleasant- almost a little fruity when you apply it, and then the smell fades. I’ve used it on hot days where I get sweaty and it stays on pretty good without sweating off much. If you wear white the day you apply it, you may see a little bit of color transfer, but not bad. Very happy with the product and I will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S

customer_reviews.title: Natural Self Tanner
customer_reviews.text: So let me start off by saying I like this tanner because of the natural ingredients. If you are in a hurry to get some very natural, bronzey looking color, this is it. However.... if you do not spread it quickly and evenly, you will wind up streaky. Also keep a loofah or a washcloth nearby to get the color off your hands, asap. I tried using gloves and I just can’t spread it properly with gloves on. One more thing, if you sweat at night, it will get on your sheets. BUT, it does all wash out. So all and all works great, but with some caveats. Oh and it lasts about a week before having to reapply.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bahama self tanner
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm liking this self tanner..I've only used it twice but after the first application I could already tell a slight difference..it doesn't leave you orange and actually has a nice smell as you're putting it on then fades away because I don't smell anything, good or bad shortly after I've applied. The only thing is I seem to almost stay a little sticky from it longer than I'd expect but that may also just be me not allowing it enough time before I'm on the go..either way it doesn't bother me and I've been wearing shorts after applying so not worried about any rub off. All in all I would recommend this tanner.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Fair to medium get Level 1!
customer_reviews.text: I exfoliated, put a minimal amount on my skin and tan was dramatic. Too dramatic for me. I am caucasion usually get medium beige in foundation makeup. I just got back from Florida and had a bit of a tan that I wanted to maintain. This product works. Its great. But if you want to slowly layer a tan Level 2 of this product is way to dramatic dark in my opinion. I did not want to go out the door after one use with thoroughly different dark skintone. Its also expensive! best to layer with Level 1 formula.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia McKasty

customer_reviews.title: Great smell!! Okay color
customer_reviews.text: I received this product so excited to try it! The smell was wonderful! No nasty fake tan smell. I exfoliated my body per the instructions. I applied it to my body. It went on relatively easy. I allowed it to dry. And did not shower until the following morning. I felt like the color rinsed off in the shower. Perhaps I’m just used to a “darker, deeper color”. I also reapplies it the following day, and same thing, the color washed off, not leaving me any more tan. Overall I was a bit disappointed, but really enjoyed not smelling like fake tanner!
customer_reviews.author: chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Works for me.  No direction needed.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried multiple self tanners and this one works the best for me. Let me be clear. I do not follow directions and quite honestly never read them. I just slapped it on my scratched up, pale , tree trunk looking legs. It has a very pleasant smell and makes my legs actually look tan! No Orange orange or streaks. My feet look kinda dumb where you can tell I stopped rubbing it in but that's it. I don't use a mit or gloves so I do have to wash my hands well. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Valkay

customer_reviews.title: So far I like it better than everything else I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: I only gave you 4 stars because I have only had the product 5 days. So far I like it better than everything else I have ever used. No orangey color, but definitely on the bronze side. It doesn't have that awful smell many self tanners have. I think I have to practice a little more with how much I put on the mitt and use. I used it 2 days in a row and I was (very) noticeably tan. I skipped 2 days and have reapplied it. It would be great if I could build a base tan and then just apply it 1 or 2 times a week. Hope that is possible -- guess we will see.
customer_reviews.author: eva

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and gives you a nice tan
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I apply with a tanning mitt. I don't even have to wear the glove under the mitt because it doesn't soak through. It leaves a nice bronzer that washes off and then you have a nice even tan. Good for those of us who want that California tan, but don't want to hang out in the sun to get it or be explosed to harmful tanning booths or chemical spray tans. It has a light scent, but nothing too harsh. I am sensitive to smells, so this one is not too bad, and once you shower and remove the bronzer you don't smell anything at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kathey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product out last night on my feet and hands as a little comparison test and I am beyond impressed! I actually have a darker complexion already but this product still worked for me! In the photo, you could really see the color difference. On a side note, it smells like a tropical play-doh :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Look; Excellent Price
customer_reviews.text: I just received my second bottle of this self tanner, and I love the appearance it leaves on my legs. I’m in my sixties, and I’ve played tennis outdoors for over thirty consecutive years. I have a lot of sunspots on my legs, and I now use sunscreen outdoors, so I’ve tried various self tanners. This one is my favorite. It has a nice looking color, and creates a smooth, flawless appearance on my sunspotted legs. The price is excellent, as I’ve tried more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Best all around tanner
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS! I try between 10-20 self tanners a year and this would be this years winner! You can immediately see results, and it continues to build. It's easy to apply, does not streak and much to my ecstatic surprise, it smells good!! Yesterday after applying it (my 3rd application) I didn't put any perfume on or anything and my husband came over to kiss me while I was doing dishes and he was like "oh my god you smell so good!". All around this self tanner is at the top and I'll be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza

customer_reviews.title: Very natural looking!! LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m always hesitant when buying self-tanners because of the questionable ingredients and quality of the product! This tanning lotion is my new fave due to it having pretty clean ingredients and having such a natural look. It doesn’t turn you orange or yellow. The lotion is tinted so you know where it has been applied which helps tremendously!! I haven’t noticed any “self-tanner scent” that lingers with most products even days after applying! This stuff is amazing! Love, love, love! I will definitely purchase again!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley G.

customer_reviews.title: Description of listed ingredients wrong!
customer_reviews.text: It clearly states on the bottle HYDROGENATED CANOLA OIL. Well in the description on amazon it just says organic canola oil. Thats a clear lie! Why would I want to rub hydrogenated oil on me when I dont ingest that garbage. Add on the fact its canola oil which is bad for you by itself and is not necessary it's only a filler.
customer_reviews.author: Kale

customer_reviews.title: Pale as a ghost
customer_reviews.text: I've tried them all. I'm super white and pasty. This one definitely gives the best color. (in my opinion) It's natural looking but doesn't have to "build up". You look great the next day, so go ahead and shave your legs. Shaving was always a problem for me when the weekend was coming up and I had to "layer" my tan. You can reapply this tonight and look great tomorrow. I bought it because some reviewers said it smells great. It doesn't. None of them do. They all smell like dha. They have to if they're going to work. I also love that it's organic.
customer_reviews.author: Lori P.

customer_reviews.title: Very natural looking
customer_reviews.text: This self tanner works well for me. I followed all of the instructions and suggestions, including applying lotion to certain spots beforehand and applying the tanner with the buffing glove, and the results are great. I initially switched from the product I had been using for several years after my teenage son commented on my "orange legs". After doing some homework on line, I found Bahama Tan and thought I'd spend the extra money and give it a try. And yes, it passed the teenager's critical eye!
customer_reviews.author: Stella J

customer_reviews.title: If orange skin is your thing.
customer_reviews.text: First off it turned my skin very orange, so orange that people commented on it. I only applied a thin layer and I have naturally olive skin tone so I was shocked it turned me orange. I do think it smells amazing but I do not like how you have to apply it, the bottle doesn't seem like the best for a tanner you either squeeze out tiny amounts at a time or a lot. Much better self tanners out there in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Best Tanner I've uses
customer_reviews.text: I love it! one of THE best tanner I've uses, and I've used a lot of different tanners in the past. the color after one application is even and natural looking, not orange at all. the texture spreads and absorbs nicely, as well as a pleasant smell. if there could be any changes, it would be nice to have the manufacturer remove the tiny sparkles from the formula, as well as make the smell less strong. I don't really mind the glitter and color guard, because it washes off with water once ur tan has developed, but some people really hate glitter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am extremely happy with my recent purchase of Bahama Tan
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with my recent purchase of Bahama Tan. First of all it lives up to the claim of not having that unpleasant odor associated with most self tanners. Upon application the scent reminds me of sun tan lotion, quite pleasant. Once the lotion dries the scent does not linger. Application is easy; follow the clear directions and application tips. Gloves are recommended, however, I used bare hands and scrubbed well with warm, soapy water afterwards. I found the seller to be quite responsive and helpful. I contacted them with a question and received a prompt and helpful reply. Finally,the tanning result of this product is amazing: natural and even colored. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Greenleaf

customer_reviews.title: Looks natural and easy to apply!
customer_reviews.text: My face never tans, only burns so I cover my face or wear a hat when in the sun. I bought this to use on my face only. With that being said it really looks natural and matches my natural tan on the rest of my body. I lotion my face first and then apply a dime size amount to face and neck. It's not greasy and dries as if I have nothing on. Also, I always wash my hands right after applying and it doesn't leave my hands dyed. Smells really good and I love the fact it's natural and I'm not putting chemicals on my face. I will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Triem

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a good way
customer_reviews.text: Like some other reviews I only needed to apply this twoce to get the color I was looking for. I tan well naturally but have a desk job so this helped me feel like ive been in the sun without people asking what happend or where i went. I have an olive complexion but when i have no pigment im a little yellow/green and thin skinned so i was worried this would turn me brown or orange. It did a great job and doesnt stink. I had never used self tanner before so i did some reaser h before getting this and im happy i did
customer_reviews.author: Sofia M

customer_reviews.title: I don't hate but I don't love it.
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease of application but I feel the color washes off with less than stellar results in color pay off. I applied at night, let it dry and liked the color very much. Next morning you can see the. color indicators wash away and thats fine but the remaining tan is a bit light. This is also ok as I prefer to not get dark overnight but the color is just a tad too light for the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Keely B.

customer_reviews.title: Great, natural color.
customer_reviews.text: I like this stuff! I've had bad experiences with streaking and smell with other self tanners in the past, but a girl at my work looked great and convinced me to try again. You *MUST* get a $5 mitt to apply. It is a night and day difference! This has a totally natural color and is organic. Very good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have been nervous about trying another self tanner after having an allergic reaction to the Sally Hansen brand. I have not had an allergic reaction to this self tanner, I am very impressed! This goes on nice & easily. The color is very natural & the guard does wash off but leaves a good color after a shower. The smell is good at first but once it’s sets it does get the “self tanner smell” but it is not to strong smelling. I definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ciera Brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bronze color
customer_reviews.text: Received this a few days ago, and I’ve only used it once, but I LOVE it so far. I’m olive skinned, and this provides the perfect bronze tan. It makes me the color that I am during summers, without me having to leave cold Chicago. The other thing I’ve noticed is that it doesn’t get streaky or flakey as it fades like a lot of other self-tanners. I highly recommend this tanner.
customer_reviews.author: C. Nairn

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL
customer_reviews.text: Orange, orange, orange, streaky even though I followed the directions precisely, and takes FOREVER to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Kat_P

customer_reviews.title: Best I've found yet!
customer_reviews.text: Being a natural "Ginger" we all know our tan is our freckles. We just don't tan. I purchased this and in about 2-3 hours it started working. The smell wasn't too unpleasant after it was setting in for a few hours, but brought that clay sent and didn't stain my sheets. It's lastest for a total of 5 days thus far and haven't had to reapply just yet but will on Wednesday for sure as that will be my 7 day mark and when I am off work, hehe. Love that s product and will def be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: VirginiaREALTOR

customer_reviews.title: Best tanning lotion ever & it's organic
customer_reviews.text: Glad I tried this tanner! I first noticed it because it was organic and so happy I did. I used the mitt & the lotion goes on really nice. I had no problems with streaks, my feet, hands & elbows looked good using lotion first. My skin did not get a dry feeling like it has with other lotions. It did not have that awful smell either. This is now my favorite tanner! I am also using the Bahama Tan Extender between the tan lotion days and I love it too but that's another review. I highly recommend trying both!!
customer_reviews.author: Salley Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great sunless tanner- great price!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used a sunless tanner in years but wanted to start again. I read the reviews (watched the video review) and purchased it. I love this product. The color is great, I look like I've been in the sun for hours. It does not smell like traditional sunless tanners. It dries quickly. I think the most important thing is the color - so natural. I will definitely purchase again. The price was right. I was considering 2 other brands that were double the price, so glad I made this decision.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great color and no awful smell
customer_reviews.text: So today was the first day using this self tanner and I was surprised. Usually they smell bad or they are a funny color. This was easy to put on and my color after just two hours is beautiful! I can't wait to use it on the rest of my body, not just legs and arms. I will be reordering again. This is one to try if you are looking for more color.
customer_reviews.author: alisa merriott

customer_reviews.title: Nice tanner
customer_reviews.text: In the market of sunless tanners this worked really well. I recommend using the mit for easy application. The tan came out very even and the areas where I missed the first time blended well on the 2nd time. Tan came nice and natural, not orange. The smell isn't too bad, it not overpowering like some of the other tanners but it does have a faint scent, mixing it with lotion would help mild the scent
customer_reviews.author: Carolynne

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product and bronzes me rather quickly and so be ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and bronzes me rather quickly and so be careful when applying especially your knees, elbows and ankles as the first time I used it I had dark ankles lol but one application goes a long way. The self tanning smell does occur after it is dry though but at least this is all natural and organic and no chemicals
customer_reviews.author: K. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Buying again
customer_reviews.text: Works great especially if you have a tanning glove. Nice natural looking tan developed within 10 hours. No skin irritations or complaints! Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Mangette

customer_reviews.title: Incredible scent and beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: I am a self tanner junkie. I’ve bought more products than I can count on two hands and this is by far my favorite. My poor boyfriend is constantly applying my tanner and he was even impressed with this one...Application was a breeze and I loved the creamy lotion. The smell is incredible and wears well for several days. The medium shade is a deep bronze and looks beautiful on my olive skin. I am glad that I took a chance on something new, totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice color but STAINS
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this lotion other than it easily rubs off and stains whatever you sit on--even the following day. My poor mini cooper seat (tho dark colored) is ruined because of the lotion rubbing off on my seats even when I applied it the night before which is at least 14 hours before driving. I have only had this car for 2 years, now the seats are ruined!
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyRuger

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have VERY sensitive skin and need something that is fragrance free so I don’t get a rash. Unfortunately, I did break out in itchy, irritated bumps on my legs. I generally don’t have any problems with the application with my sunless tanner but I felt this one faded awkwardly. It seemed like it turned yellow by my armpits and obviously on my feet when it faded completely everywhere else. I did like the color the first few days though. I also have very fair skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely no SMELL.
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a review for another self tanner, but scratch that one!!! This is the absolute best!!!!! This has no nasty smell for real. If you weren't going to take a shower you would forget you had it on. Tha tan is just right. AWESOME!!! The smell is like coconut & vanilla. The best
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Really nice product with a pleasant scent
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product with a pleasant scent. It works really well if you want a nice, natural looking tan. It's organic and doesn't contain any harmful chemicals which is great for your skin. The only thing is that you have to apply and then moisturize with normal lotion to prolong the life of the tan. In addition, I would recommend that you apply the tanning lotion one or twice a week after your initial 2-3 day application. The product is a bit pricey, but it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Robust Brown Results
customer_reviews.text: I took a bottle of baby oil and mixed them together. The lotion went on so smoothly. I was afraid I had ruined it, but it worked better than ANY self tanner that I’ve ever used. I rubbed it in very well and it worked wonderfully! It was not orange, but it looked orange until I rubbed it in well. Then my skin turned a nice robust brown.
customer_reviews.author: Judith C. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Great natural looking tan!
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this product. It gave me a natural looking tan and it doesn't have that smell that other tanners do. Since its summer, it isn't giving me a dark enough tan but it is going to be my go to tanner for the fall and winter. Be very careful because it stains quickly so use a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Many have been good. Many have been awful
customer_reviews.text: I'm obsessed! I have been using tanning lotions and doing spray tans for 15 years now. Many have been good. Many have been awful! But this has been the best! It is instant and as long as you follow the directions (don't get water on yourself before instructed to shower) you will have a flawless tan. Most lotions need to be applied numerous days in a row for full benefit. After 2 applications (once a day) I achieved a perfect rich color. And it is still nice and rich 2 days later. I am now buying some for other family members.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Smith

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive Skin don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and while looking online this product came up as a good one to use. It was easy to use. I followed the instructions. The night after I put it on, I became itchy. I had to take Benadryl. The next two nights even though I didn’t reapply, I was still itchy. I did love the color it turned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's okay!
customer_reviews.text: I do like this stuff and the fact that it shows you where you're putting it because it goes on tinted. However.. it did turn out streaky compared to other self tanners I've used. I also really don't like the smell but it's not a horrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Cassi

customer_reviews.title: Best self tanner
customer_reviews.text: Best self tanner!! I have tried several self tanners over the years and this is by far the best! It’s tinted so you can see it when you are applying it and it immediately gives you a beautiful tan which gradually gets a little darker over a few hours. I have a fair complexion and this gives me a great natural looking tan that I do not get from the sun! It smells great too! Once a week works good for me and I use Jergens Natural Glow in between a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Really like this tanner!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tanner. The color doesn’t last very long but it seems to wear away more evenly than others! Other tanners I have used the color lasts longer but like it annoyingly won’t wash off in areas. This tanner seems to just wear away evenly and then my skin is ready for another application that goes on evenly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I needed something that would add color to my face since I have had a couple of skin cancers even though I don't and never have
customer_reviews.text: Lovely Product. It goes on smoothly, has a pleasant odor, and colors "gently" by which I mean it doesn't leave glaring streaks somewhere. I needed something that would add color to my face since I have had a couple of skin cancers even though I don't and never have spent a great deal of the time sun bathing), and my dermatologist nearly faints at the thought of tanning parlors. But I'm very washed out without some color in my face so this is a VERY NICE alternative to add color without the hassle of daily makeup!
customer_reviews.author: Laura L

customer_reviews.title: Not what you think
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely not what I wanted. I couldn’t wash my hands 5 hours after without it all running off. Felt sticky for a solid hour and a half. Doesn’t dry and moves around way to easily. Super patchy and orange.
customer_reviews.author: agnes

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: This smells horrible! I couldn't sleep cause the smell kept me awake. Seriously. Had to return. Got on my clothes and sheets too. I bought Tanceuticals with a coconut scent and I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Pixie

customer_reviews.title: Mostly satisfactory
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what to think about this product. The ingredients definitely sound better than regular fake tans, but it smells and feels very much the same. I followed the instructions to the letter, but I'm still seeing dark and light patches develop that look a lot like freckling, so I'm not crazy about that. Maybe the application technique just takes practice to perfect? All in all, I'm pretty satisfied just because I feel like I made the healthier choice, although I was hoping for more consistent results! Shipping was on time and the product (aside from the mixed results) was as described. No fault on the part of the providers, only some criticism regarding the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exfoliate and moisturize the day before for best results
customer_reviews.text: I want to give this 4.5 stars but it wont let me. The reason I wont give it 5 is the cost. The last few summers I used Banana Boat Summer Color and I am not sure if they changed something or not but it didn't have the same appearance this year. Tried this Bahama Tan and I am not disappointed. It's a little sticky while drying but if follow the recommendations the end result is pretty good. I am on my second bottle. It has a pleasant aroma to it, not like other self tanners. I like that it hasn't stained my clothing so far. If they don't change the formula, I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: One not the other

customer_reviews.title: Nice tan
customer_reviews.text: Use on a well hydrated area and you only need a very small amount of product. It blends well and looks like a natural bronzed tan. I did my legs first to see how I reacted to the color. I really kind of expected an orange look, but it turned out to be a healthy looking tan. I wanted my legs just a shade darker so I did it again 2 days later. Once I felt comfortable using it I did my arms and face. Works great. No smell. Again, just a tiny bit of product goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Woolman

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Will buy again for sure. Does not get you too dark , not orange at all, and no streaks( especially when you use the application mitts which are totally amazing and worth purchasing as well. This lotion will not disappoint, but of course as with any tanning lotions apply properly and follow directions.
customer_reviews.author: Earthoceanus

customer_reviews.title: Best tanner!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually leave a lengthy review but this is an amazing product! Doesn't leave streaks goes on smooth it looks like a great tan! And best part is I have sensitive skin on my face and I haven't broken out from it!!! Highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Orange skin returns again on this product.
customer_reviews.text: On the second day, after I applied your sunless tanning lotion, I was asked if I had been drinking orange juice. I basically turned out to be the same color orange, as some of the other tanning products I have used. That's very disappointing to me, since I bought 3 bottles of your product. I applied it exactly as the instructions said. I bought this product because it was Amazon's choice.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great natural color. Easy to apply. Fades evenly.
customer_reviews.text: I generally used Famous Dave's, which is a great product too, but wanted something organic and free of harmful ingredients. Glad I took a chance and bought this. It is very easy to apply. Absolutely no streaking and beautiful color! I have light olive skin so it can be tricky to find a color that's dark enough but not too dark. I would say if you have a medium skin tone this product would work well for you. It is extremely natural looking and it's fades very evenly. Overall excellent product and better than much more exoensive brands!
customer_reviews.author: Trudy Walker

customer_reviews.title: not good for pinky white girls it turns orange
customer_reviews.text: It turns your skin orangeeeee I'm a very white girl and this is not suited for us super white. I would work great for someone who had a slight pigment to there skin I'm more on the pink side of white and this tanner look orange. It works fast but you have to put it on every other day it doesn't last.
customer_reviews.author: D.H

customer_reviews.title: Natural Looking Tan within Hours
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy-to-apply self tanner that is streak free and has no foul odor. In fact, I rarely notice a scent at all! It transforms into a nice, natural tan for my medium toned skin within hours. This is my second bottle, and I still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Heitzmann

customer_reviews.title: one of the best self tanners I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, one of the best self tanners I have purchased. Fragrance is pleasant and not the typical self tanner tanbark smell, the color appears dark and natural and the longevity of the tan is amazing. I LOVE IT SO MUCH!
customer_reviews.author: pepe

customer_reviews.title: Bahama Tan Self Tanning Lotion
customer_reviews.text: I have been using sunless tanners for the past couple of years - tried several Organic lotions - mainly from family owned/small business companies - I really do Love the Bronze Color - better than most. Follow-up was great - refreshing to receive messages from companies who actually appreciate your business. Level 2 provides a deep bronze color - Will buy product again!
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Good color - Must use mit to apply
customer_reviews.text: I have been using sunless tanners for a few years now, as a way to avoid UV rays from actual tanning. Recently, I learned of the harmful ingredients in most sunless tanners and have been on the hunt for a more natural solution. I have tried one other organic tanner before this one. I have used this one for about a week and enjoy looking pretty tan. I found that I love the color this sunless tanner gives you, but that I have to use a glove to make sure everything looks even and natural. Now that I know how to apply it that works the best for me, I think I am sold on this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Self-Tanner EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best self-tanner I have ever used. It smells absolutely wonderful! The lotion itself has a lovely bronze shade that is blendable and natural, and gives a gorgeous "tan" immediately upon application. The "tan" that develops is just the same ... a really beautiful color without a hint of orange. I'm fair so wondered if the medium shade would be too dark for me, but the lotion is so blendable, it is easily adjusted to just the right intensity. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: DL Mandli

customer_reviews.title: The best so far
customer_reviews.text: I tried this for the first time last night and am really pleased. I followed the directions and exfoliated my skin first, and also used a mitt to apply. It gave me an even, non streaked, natural looking tan. I have tried MANY self tanners, and this is the best so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great!! I highly recommend. I have used it twice so far and I am very happy with the golden tan results. Each time I used an exfoliating sponge in the shower, towel dried but left slightly damp and put on a thin layer of regular lotion. Once dried I applied with a hand glove, slept on it and the next day it was perfect. I put a little less on my face the second go round because it soaked it up so well in comparison to the rest of the body.
customer_reviews.author: Goldieloxx

customer_reviews.title: Little bit goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: Love this Tanner. Doesn't look orange looks natural has a little bit of the sunless Tanner stinky smell but I think it's the best I have tried yet. I did buy gloves to apply the Tanner though I think that helps.
customer_reviews.author: becky Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: love this stuff!! works so well and looks pretty natural. worth the price. read other reviews on how to best apply it. make sure you apply it a day or two before you need it to look nice, because it takes a little while to set.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Aderer

customer_reviews.title: Best Sunless Tanner ..Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am elated that I have found this product! I've used sunless tanners for years and ultimately, was dissatisfied with either the scent, orange undertones, or price. This sunless tanner results in an immediate golden, sun-kissed glow (has natural bronzer) that develops into a deep, natural tan. Even better, I didn't detect a scent once the product developed. I kept a tan for 5 days with only 1 application. Thank you for this amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Lee

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, I was a bit worried about trying a self tanner because past experiences I've turned out orange, I tried Bahama Tan and was amazed at the color, love it and it last a long time, I will definitely buy again and recommend this product❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Favorite self tanner!
customer_reviews.text: This product smells amazing!! It smells very tropical and sweet, doesn't have that icky self tanner smell you get with a lot of tanner lotions. The product is a dark brown shade so it makes it easy to see when applying. I used a mit to apply it which always gives me a streak free tan, only had some problems around my ankles. The tan isn't very dark but looks natural. I am very pale during the winter months but tan easily drying the summer so this is the perfect product for those awkward in between months!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Ray

customer_reviews.title: This product has no harmful ingredients. That was the ...
customer_reviews.text: This product has no harmful ingredients. That was the reason I purchased it. When you open the bottle you will see that it has a dark tint and that will help you see how well you are distributing it evenly over your skin. The color of your tan will appear hours later and the tint from the product will wash off in the shower, leaving only the new tan which will last for several days. It takes practice to decide how often to reapply, but start out slow and gradually increase the frequency to your own liking.
customer_reviews.author: grace s.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Best tanner I've ever used. Just make sure you go very light around the knees, ankles, elbows etc.. and wear the gloves.. I have the dark tanner and it will stain your hands.
customer_reviews.author: SRC

customer_reviews.title: Natural looking tan for us pasty girls!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this tanner! I am extremely fair and have a hard time finding sunless tanners that A. Look natural B. Don't turn me orange and C. Aren't streaky and this tanner checked all the boxes for me! Absolutely love it! I was hesitant to buy the medium thinking it would be too dark and unnatural, but I tried the tips on the back of the bottle and it worked really well for me. Super helpful tips from the company and great customer service as well.
customer_reviews.author: welch

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, moisturizing, sunny glow
customer_reviews.text: I liked the smell and the moisturizing benefit. It is still a little more "orange" in color than I prefer. It appears to be a lighter tanning color than what I had hoped buying a "medium color". Even layering didn't seem to help. I'll probably go back to the much more expensive (and not as pleasant smelling) Bare Minerals Faux Tan for the dark tan color.
customer_reviews.author: Silverlake Horses

customer_reviews.title: I love this self tanner
customer_reviews.text: I love this self tanner! I'm no longer orange. :) I also love the coconut scent. Makes me feel like I'm on vacation. My 19 year old son uses it too. I had to purchase another bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Gave me a pretty good tan after the first 2 applications! It was a little hard to tell where it was going on my skin as it's light and shimmery in color but i just made sure to put enough on. Didn't make my face blotchy either. Definitely will be continuing to use! I love that it's all natural too
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Heavy tan guide
customer_reviews.text: This tanning lotion leaves a nice color with little odor. I would like to buy it without the tanning guide in it. It is so dark and orange looking that I can't go anywhere while leaving it on and it gets all over the clothes and bedding. I have to use it only when I'm not going anywhere for the day. Tried it at night and it was everywhere on my sheets and pillowcases. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Ivory skin needs light color NOT medium.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good overall. Difficult to keep up natural look after first application but I am new at this. Lots of tips available. Best one is to USE GLOVES! It does smell a bit if a lot is applied. After a shower the following day, smell goes away, but so does some of the color. Maybe lighter shower spray and cooler water could help. Also, wait 20 min+ drom last application stroke to put clothes on.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: Great color. Apply, let dry, wait 24hrs. Rinse with soap and water, just use your hand No scrubbing. Now put on any lotion . Perfect color very happy.
customer_reviews.author: smurfmonkey

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and reliable!
customer_reviews.text: Worked well. I mixed it with lotion because I was afraid of what it would look like since it looks so dark and I’m so so white. I did it as a mild base tan before my tropical trip. It stains badly though and I definitely recommend gloves when applying. Smell isn’t bad, compared to some tanning solutions I’ve used .
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great color!! Not super sticky or smelly either.
customer_reviews.text: Ummm this is by far the best tanning lotion I’ve ever used. I was using Beauty by Earth before, but it just smelled so strongly (almost unbearable) which is why I went looking for another option. Not only does this not smell as strong, but the color is so much better!!! It’s actually TAN, not orangey. It still has a smell but it’s pleasant. And even better, IT’S NOT STICKY!! I actually forgot I had put it on. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great self tanning lotion th ecology is not orange and it is easy to apply the only thing is you need to take time to apply even but I really love it especially when you going from winter to summer and the time between that seasons you don’t wanna look really pale. I really like it and definitely will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mom from NYC

customer_reviews.title: Favorite sunless tanner
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Works well and smells great. Helpful tips on the bottle helped me make sure to use best. I am susceptible to skin cancer but love to tan. I have used many sunless tanners and this is my favorite. It is also cruelty free which is something important to me.
customer_reviews.author: xmellybellyx

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Works! It has a nice brown color for application so you can see where you have applied it or missed a spot! Washes of with cool water afterward! No bad chemical smell No staining on clothes Comes off gradually like a tan would No orange color Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Espy-Dalton

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I had used the same sunless tanner for 15 years and it was discontinued! I searched and researched and decided on this product. The color is beautiful, not orangey at all. I applied with bare hands and had no staining but be sure to wash your hands immediately. The smell? Reminds me of old Cocoa Puffs soaking in milk but it dissipates after a few hours. I will definitely reorder this product. Post note: I just received my reorder of 3 bottles, it's a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact it's all natural
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact it's all natural. It definitely gets you tan but you have to be very careful with not getting streaks. Exfoliation is key and you really have to tub it in very well so its not streaky. I would prob mix it with regular lotion so it's not as thick.
customer_reviews.author: Polly026

customer_reviews.title: Works.
customer_reviews.text: Watch out with this though. Just use a little or you'll be a strange tan. Once I figured that out, I use it sparingly Will buy it again!👌
customer_reviews.author: Ferret  Lady

customer_reviews.title: The smell isn’t great. Coconut would be nice
customer_reviews.text: I only put one application on and my co-workers thought I sat out in the sun. To maintain the tan, I use it before bed. I did skip a day and the tan faded just a bit. It is a nice, rich color for me. I am a medium skin type. It goes on easily and dries in about 5 minutes. This is my second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: metlover

customer_reviews.title: Great tanner
customer_reviews.text: Love the color this tanning lotion provides! You do need to watch the elbows, knees and tops of the feet for extra color deposits. If you wait to apply color to those areas until last and use what is left on the mitt then you will do much better! Definitely follow their directions on the bottle and you will happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yokielj

customer_reviews.title: Wish they didn't change the formula! Now the lotion ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish they didn't change the formula! Now the lotion is a really dark brown/black color. Bleeds into clothing but does wash out. Go back to the light brown coloring of lotion!!
customer_reviews.author: Ranell

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Horrible experience... Broke out in hives (never have from any other sunless tanning product before. Very streaky & orange. Only good thing ; no strong smell.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The product works well and smells good. I had some trouble avoiding streaks in some areas with this product. It does tan quickly though
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this product twice because I wanted to follow the directions as stated. So far, so good! I've noticed it was a pretty gradual tan and zero streaking or spots. My legs really came out great as did the rest of my body. I will definitely be buying this again next year!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Easy application, after you get the hang of it!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. So satisfied that I purchased my second bottle. There was a little learning curve with the application for me, but I am getting the hang of it. Instructions and other reviews on Amazon have been very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Kirckhoff

customer_reviews.title: Not one splotch/streak!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product in such a rushed hurry, and it still comes out completely blended and beautiful! Absolutely love the color as well; I'm naturally super pale, and anytime I use this tanner I get amazing compliments about how I have a "golden glow."
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: The product works well, and I used a mitt to apply it so no streaking. It is subtle, allowing you to layer it to get the desired tan, and it doesn't have that weird fragrance I've seen with other products. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Who needs the sun?
customer_reviews.text: My wife purchased this product after doing some research and never uses any tanning lotions . This product is great! She loves the way it looks on her and is going to purchase another bottle. Thanks for a great product.. Easy 5 Star rating 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Oscar The Grouch

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a lot of sunless tanners and I am not sure why I ordered this one. Now I know why! This produces such a natural tan and it is all organic. I was very shocked the next day when I looked in the mirror. Flawless. I will recommend this product to all of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Smith

product_meta.title: Level 2 Medium Self Tanner Organic & Natural, Body & Face, Bahama Tan Self Tanning Lotion, No Orange Streak-Free Sunless Tanner, 7.5 oz with Pump
feature_bullets: HAPPINESS GUARANTEE: We're so confident that you will love Bahama Tan that we have a no-questions asked money back guarantee!

YOUR PERFECT TAN COLOR: Develop your own personal tan color as dark as you want to go with No streaking, No orange, No blotchiness and No toxic chemicals. Simply apply Bahama Tan self tanning lotion 1 to 4 (or more) days in a row to achieve YOUR perfect tan color.

ORGANIC & NATURAL INGREDIENTS: Bahama Tan Self Tanner is made with pure, natural and organic ingredients perfectly blended to create a rich, natural looking tan without the sun. Eco Cert approved DHA, Food Grade Preservatives and Organic Ingredients like Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Argan Oil and Monoi de Tahiti Oil that deeply moisturize your skin. Paraben Free and great for all skin types including sensitive skin.

NON-TOXIC: Truly a good-for-the-skin sunless tanner with No mineral oils, No lanolin, No parabens, No PABA, No alcohol, No petro-chemicals, No sodium lauryl sulfate, No formaldehyde, No toxic chemicals, No propylene glycol, No butylene glycol, No fillers, and No artificial fragrances.

EASY PEASY: Free step-by-step instructions, helpful and little known tips included right on the bottle so you always have everything you need for a beautiful, flawless tan right at your finger tips. One bottle of Bahama Tan Self Tanner is enough for many full body and face applications. Your new sunless tan will last 4 to 7 days.
